hevs.gdx2d.components.bitmaps

Class BitmapImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.components.bitmaps.BitmapImage

  • public final class BitmapImage
extends java.lang.Object
    An image encapsulation class. Allows to store an image and to use it for drawing.
    Version:
    1.11
    Author:
    Nils Chatton (chn), Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

      • isContained

        public boolean isContained(int x,
                  int y)
        Is a given pixel position contained in the image or not The pixel is given in image space (width x height)
        Parameters:
        x - x-position of the pixel
        y - y-position of the pixel
        Returns:
        if the pixel is contained inside the image

      • pixelInScreenSpace

        public Vector2 pixelInScreenSpace(Vector2 pixelPosition,
                         Vector2 imagePosition)
        To get the color of a pixel in an image, we must get translate screen coordinates to image coordinates This is the role of the following function.
        Parameters:
        pixelPosition - The pixel we want to read, in screen coordinates
        imagePosition - The current position of the image, in screen coordinates
        Returns:
        The pixel position in the image space coordinates

        Parameters:

        y - The y position we want to read
        Returns:
        The color read
